name: FishImplementationGuide
title: Fish Implementation Guide
description: An example of how FSH can be used to create an IG about fish

resource.name: Advance Directives in EHR
resource.description: The anticipate directives are in the EHR of the patient. This field is present

resource.name: AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: This profile is used to track the allergies and intolerances of a patient based on a given value set.

resource.name: Care Plan
resource.description: A Care Plan tailored to the needs of CARA with advanced directives

resource.name: Care Team
resource.description: The care team is comprised of the patient, his legal representatives, healthcare professionals contributing to his shared care plan and externals.

resource.name: Condition
resource.description: A condition is used too describe the clinical status and diagnosis made to a patient.

resource.name: Country of Birth
resource.description: This field is used to render the country of birth of the patient

resource.name: Existence of AD
resource.description: This field is used to indicate whether a patient has advanced directives

resource.name: Goal
resource.description: The purpose of a Goal is to track a topic around the Shared Care Plan with its associated list of goals.

resource.name: Historical Data
resource.description: Used to describe the historical background of a patient affiliated to CARA

resource.name: Observation
resource.description: An observation is used to track the status of the patient on a given goal.

resource.name: Patient
resource.description: This profile extension is used to ensure the fields of the master patient index are properly used throughout the implementation.

resource.name: Patient Priorities
resource.description: Used to describe the priorities of a patient with regard to his SCP

resource.name: Social Data
resource.description: Used to describe the social background of a patient affiliated to CARA
